Title: The History of Future Folk
Actors: Nils d'Aulaire, Jay Klaitz, Julie Ann Emery, April Hernandez Castillo
Plot: Two aliens from the planet Hondo have come take over our planet. But when they discover an amazing human invention called "music", they immediately abandon their mission, head to a tiny Brooklyn bar, and start the universe's first Hondonian bluegrass duo: Future Folk!
